reviews.review: Very, very fun. Amazing plotline, great voice acting, and enjoyable humor. I recommend this to all.
Long time fan of Portal 2, can't say anything bad about this game.
Good Game
Gayet hoş bir oyun hikayeleri olsun movementı olsun beyin yakan bulmacaları olsun bitirmeye değer

无与伦比的经典之作，精彩纷呈的脑洞集锦。

+++剧情的设计连贯，角色性格刻画优秀（当然不是指哑巴主角），二五仔的啰嗦不必多说，而你大可以完全相信毒舌前女友。
+++延续一代的辉煌，为这一系列的玩法带来了新意，新增的道具也让游戏更精彩耐玩，尽管很多时候看到白墙就是通关。
++自圆其说的世界观设计，举例传送门只能打在月壤墙的设定既完善了剧情解开玩家的疑问，同时也为结局埋下伏笔。
++优秀的优化与较低的固件要求。
++双人模式的设计（虽然我没有人一起玩
+地图内彩蛋众多，墙上有很多让人不明觉厉的涂鸦，给剧情挖了个小坑算是？
+地图设计较人性化，存档点也较多不至于让人出现失误崩溃的情况。
+配音到位
+低廉售价，3块钱啊！

--玩家作为被测试者一言不发的问题很大，很容易没有代入感而产生一种快乐都是你俩姬器人的和我一点关系也没有。
-v社不数3（不）
-游戏引擎的缘故使游戏整体风格较阴暗。

强力推荐，期待仍有续作。

[h1]Portal and Partners[/h1]
It is said to have been inspired by [i]Narbacular Dorp[/i] and [i]The Power of paint[/i].
[list]
[*]The plot in single-person mode is tense and exciting, and the puzzles are clever.
[*]The two-person model requires close cooperation and brings a sense of accomplishment.
[/list]
Egg: Mod [i]Portal Reload[/i] has been released at Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255980/Portal_Reloaded/
incredibly interesting game with many great and challenging puzzles

Very good overall, just like the first game. The puzzles are good from start to finish, and the newer things in the second half keep things fresh. There's an actual story this time around, and while I don't think that was something lacking in the first Portal, it's definitely a positive addition. The dry, sarcastic, and sometimes bad humour keeps it from getting too serious and just works. My one complaint is the same that I had with the first Portal. You go from having very defined progression to being completely in the dark, and in Portal 2 that cycle repeats. I don't think you need to know exactly how far along you are in a game at all times, but it's somewhat annoying when you think you're almost done and still have half the game left. It's definitely not a dealbreaker; just a little annoyance worth mentioning.

Das Spiel ist gut. Mann sieht eine Deutlich Verbesserung zum ersten Teil und obwohl das Spiel jetzt schon ziemlich alt ist, ist die Grafik noch in tolleranten Bereich. Es macht auserdem ziemlichen Spaß und an einigen Stellen hat mann echt zu überlegen. Ich würde das Spiel weiter empfehlen.

Honestly, anyone who finds thrill and enjoyment though puzzle games will definitely have a blast playing this sequel. It’s puzzles are not easy sometimes, and will require you to stop and think thoroughly through which I think is great. The back story is interesting, and there are splats of humor here and there which really tie the package nicely. Finalizing this up, for people who are into puzzle/mystery types of games, I 99.9% recommend this game.
